class.name: TLFontFamily
class.brief_description: A set of fonts that make up a font family.

method.name: add_face
method.description: Adds font face to be used for specific style. Supported scripts are detected automatically.

method.name: add_face_for_language
method.description: Adds font face to be used for specific language and style.

method.name: add_face_for_script
method.description: Adds font face to be used for specific script and style.

method.name: add_face_unlinked
method.description: Adds font face to be used for specific style, without associating it with the script or language.

method.name: add_language
method.description: Creates new font fallback list for the language, list is created automatically when [code]add_face[/code] or [code]add_face_for_language[/code] function is called. Use ISO 639-1 (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_639-1) codes for the language names.

method.name: add_script
method.description: Creates new font fallback list for the script, list is created automatically when [code]add_face[/code] or [code]add_face_for_script[/code] function is called. Use ISO 15924 (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_15924) for the script names.

method.name: add_style
method.description: Adds new style to the family, style is created automatically when any of the [code]add_face[/code] functions is called.

method.name: get_face
method.description: Returns font iterator for the specific style.

method.name: get_face_for_language
method.description: Returns font iterator for the specific style and supported language.

method.name: get_face_for_script
method.description: Returns font iterator for the specific style and supported script.

method.name: has_style
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if font family has style.

method.name: remove_language
method.description: Removes font fallback list for the language.

method.name: remove_script
method.description: Removes font fallback list for the script.

method.name: remove_style
method.description: Removes style from the font family.
